fields.name: cvdf005
fields.label: F1.5 Welcome

aux.sampleValue:
Welcome to the Covid-19 quarterly return. 

The information provided in this return will help the Social Housing Resilience Group (SHRG) and interested stakeholders monitor the potential impact, including financial impact, on landlords and to consider support that landlords may need in the longer term.

The SHRG will keep under review the ongoing need for this information, and we will continue to collect the information until the SHRG confirms it no longer requires it.

The quarterly return is made available at the end of each quarter and a submission date 14 working days after the quarter end. 

Thank you once again for your assistance. If you have any questions on this please contact your lead regulator in the first instance.
